apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy

  namespace: adservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: adservice
  ingress:

        matchLabels:
          app: frontend
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
EOF
